content.body: joyee: i was trying to understand the different approaches for injecting `__esModule` on `require(esm)` on your pr, and reading through it looked like they were all roughly the same performance? i'd like to just use a proxy if possible, but since you went with the wrapper module approach i wanted to double check it wouldn't be bad in some way i haven't seen mentioned.
